law.catch_line: After filing an election for modified administration, the personal representative shall:...
law.text:
After filing an election for modified administration, the personal representative shall:
File a verified final report under modified administration no later than 10 months from the date of appointment instead of filing a formal inventory and account; and
On the request of any interested person, provide a formal inventory and account, as required under Title 7 of this article, to all interested persons.
